title: The Right line
creator_credit: R.H.R. Productions, Ronald H. Riley, David Cobham and Noel Cunningham Reid
brief_description: To attain championship class in motor-cycle racing, the enthusiast gains experience in many aspects of the sport, ranging from rough country scrambles to international Grand Prix. Points out The right line for keen motor-cyclists to follow and shows many exciting events taking place. Highlights include the 1960 Junior TT race in the Isle of Man, and the 1960 German Grand Prix won by Gary Hocking from Bulawayo.
